Text:
Um ... how 'bout a longer, more detailed description of the torrent there, sparky?  CS version ... products / software, PPC or Intel ... 

Y'know, the usual ... INFORMATION THAT FUCKING MATTERS, DIPSHIT.

@ ClubQBall

The Dipshit is you angry moron. Nobody force you to download this torrent. Its very easy to check the information that fucking matters before u start downloading. Just activate the magnet and read the content of the free gift. If you dont like it - trash it...

Still, he's got a point. It wouldn't have been a huge hassle for the uploader to include information like the version number, for example. Just common courtesy. Instead, he stresses the fact that it's the ADOBE Master Collection, not to be confused with the ones from, say, MICROSOFT or WALMART.

By the way, this seems to be CS5.5.

There is no point in naming any uploader a dipshit in capital letters. TPB is not a perfect world, but we can try. CS6 Master Collection is available with a little search, you know.

 I am not in the chain of peers - but thx anyway for the CS5.5 info...

@ mac.the.ripper

Stupid is as stupid does, sparky.  If YOU don't like it ... well, fuck you and that sway-backed nag you rode in on, junior.  It doesn't take much motherfucking effort to include the NECESSARY information to let folks like you, me, and others what we're getting.

So ... my advice to YOU is this:

Shut the fuck up.  No one was talking to you to begin with, asshole.  Mind your own fucking business.

And, um ... I'm not angry, by any means.  I just loathe stupidity, laziness, and apathy.  If you're going to upload something to share with others ... common courtesy and logic dictates that you provide COMPLETE information.

Now ... JUNIOR ... do you have any further questions???

Well my apologies mister QBall. I actually never intended for other people to find this and take interest, I sort of just uploaded it for a friend. Why are you so cranky, for gods sake. This is my FIRST torrent. In fact, I don't know dipshit about computer and all this dumb Photoshop crap. There's literally no reason for you to come flinging inappropriate language around. It's CS6 or whatever the hell you call it. Jesus fuck.
OR CS5..55.1.5.151;51 I DON'T FUCKING KNOW ALRIGHT i'm just a kid buzz off

The unwritten first rule of torrenting: 

If you don't fucking know, don't fucking upload. Easy.
@Jero2000 - Words of wisdom, sir.  My hat's off to you for that valuable insight you just shared.  Much respect for you.

Why another dupe with a poor title and no software description? 

And there is 28 newbs trying to download this torrent with 0 seeders. LOL
Are they just idiots here on PirateBay? The comments speak for themselves. Nobody on this page has a working torrent, but all have a great jaw ... shame on you!!!

@nobody2007 - Shut the fuck up, you pompous, pious prick.  Just because you have a pink skull & crossbones by your name doesn't make you shit, you ignorant ass.

Yes, I've never uploaded a motherfucking thing on here.  And your fucking point???  What ... are you gonna fucking ban me, bad-ass???  Who the fuck are you to even say shit to anyone on here???  

Like I said to those other two dipshits:  

Go sit down, have a Coke and a smile ... and just the fuck up.  Go bark at someone else, putz.
